page.title: 07HOUSING 1972-1984 PAGE 7
page.content: THERE ARE QUITE A FEW HOUSING ESTATES IN ARDGLASS.ASHDALE IS A PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATE ON THE DOWNPATRICK RD. OUT OF ARDGLASS.IT WAS BUILT IN 1972-1973.THERE IS A PRIVATELY OWNED HOUSING ESTATE IN HIGH ST. IN ARDGLASS.IT IS CALLED HIGH GREEN AND WAS BUILT IN ABOUT 1972-1973.MOST OF THE HOUSES WERE BUILT AT DIFFERENT TIMES.A HOUSING ESTATE WAS BUILT IN 1984 ON THE DOWNPATRICK RD.IT IS CALLED THE DOWNPATRICK RD. HOUSING ESTATE AND IS OWNED BY THE HOUSING EXECUTIVE.THE IDEA OF MAKING IT PRIVATE HAS BEEN PROPOSED.WHITEROCK DRIVE IS A PRIVATE HOUSING ESTATE ON THE STRANGFORD RD.IT WAS BUILT IN 1984.THESE HOUSES ARE PRE-FABRICATED. OF THE 119 HOUSES BUILT BY THE HOUSING EXECUTIVE,26 HAVE BEEN BOUGHT PRIVATELY AND 93 ARE STILL RENTED.
